comments.body:
Tag this as `@DeveloperApi`? Kinda sucks that Java doesn't have the `private[foo]` modifier.

(I'm trying to avoid suggesting using Hadoop's `InterfaceAudience` annotation...)

comments.body:
Also... if this is supposed to be a helper class, maybe it should be in different package.

(Edit: just noticed it can't be package-private. But `status.api` doesn't look like the best place for this code.)
